Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher is so much more beneficial. AI is a good way to check that I answered all parts of the rubric but I would not find its feedback valuable.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Gen AI feedback did not make me feel anything emotional, I just use it for constructive feedback similar to how i would feel when asking for peer feedback which I think is more comparable than teacher feedback. 
Teacher feedback obviously makes me feel more strongly as it comes with a grade.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback is much more valuable, although sometimes more vague than AI feedback.
